title: Traits and Features
content: movement speed increases by 3m, and you can make an attack that deals an additional 1d8 damge. Gloom Stalker Lvl 3 (Ranger Subclass) Bestial Fury Subclass Feature Your bond with your companion has deepened, unlocking their inner strength and giving them an Extra Attack. Beast Master Lvl 11 (Ranger Subclass) Iron Mind Subclass Feature You have honed your ability to resist the mind-altering powers of your prey.
